backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, trades, and settings with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining metadata, favicons, II URL, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web App Manifest configuring PWA metadata, icons, colors, and start behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling identity init, routing to login or authenticated app, and query client setup.
frontend/src/app/AuthenticatedApp.tsx: Authenticated shell running startup gate logic with loading, error, setup, and ready states.
frontend/src/app/queryClient.ts: Creates a configured React Query client with shared caching and retry defaults.
frontend/src/app/router.tsx: Defines all application routes using TanStack Router with AppLayout as root.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginBrandi: Login branding component showing resilient logo with fallback text if image fails.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginView.t: Login screen handling Internet Identity auth with loading, error states, and branding.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their name with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Always‑open profile setup modal allowing users to submit their name via a mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/charts/EquityCur: Responsive line chart showing equity over time with formatted dates and currency.
frontend/src/components/charts/MonthlyPe: Bar chart visualizing monthly profit in pips with color‑coded gains and losses.
frontend/src/components/charts/PairDistr: Pie chart displaying trade distribution by currency pair with labeled segments.
frontend/src/components/charts/SessionPe: Bar chart comparing trades and win rate across trading sessions.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPanel.t: Interactive chat UI allowing users to ask performance questions and receive rule‑based bot replies.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Analyt: Summary panel presenting key performance metrics with formatted KPIs and categorized sections.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/KpiGri: Displays a grid of KPI cards derived from performance metrics with safe number formatting and icons.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeFor: Provides a full trade entry/edit dialog with presets, validation, and discipline fields, syncing form state with existing trades and settings.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradesTa: Renders a sortable trade list with badges, discipline indicators, and edit/delete actions, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/settings/StartFr: Implements a danger-zone reset flow that confirms, clears all user data, resets cache, and reloads the app.
Defines the app’s main layout with top bar, side navigation, routed content area, and footer branding.
Provides a mobile slide-out navigation menu with branding and route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/shell/SideNav.ts: Renders the desktop sidebar navigation with active-state styling and route navigation.
frontend/src/components/shell/TopBar.tsx: Shows the top navigation bar with branding, mobile nav trigger, user avatar menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/startup/AppError: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload screen instead of crashing the app.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupE: Full‑screen startup error UI with optional details and a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/components/tools/Compoundin: Interactive tool that simulates compound growth over time and visualizes results with a line chart.
frontend/src/components/tools/DrawdownRe: Calculator that determines the return required to recover from a given drawdown percentage.
frontend/src/components/tools/LotSizeCal: Trading tool that computes lot size based on account size, risk, stop distance, and pip value.
frontend/src/components/tools/PipCalcula: Calculates price distance and pip count between two prices using a pip value.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskOfRuin: Estimates probability of ruin based on win rate, average win/loss, and risk per trade.
frontend/src/components/tools/RiskPercen: React component that calculates and displays risk percentage based on account size and risk amount.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding constants for logos, icons, and app metadata.
frontend/src/domain/mappers.ts: Maps trade form data into a backend Trade object with risk calculations, violations, and normalized fields.
frontend/src/domain/types.ts: Contains TypeScript types for trades, metrics, sessions, and form data used throughout the domain layer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating trades, settings, and user profiles using a safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout, retry logic, optional admin initialization, and robust error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupGate.ts: Controls app startup flow by coordinating actor and profile loading with timeout and error-based status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useStrategyPresets.ts: Provides a memoized hook that parses strategy presets from settings and exposes the preset list with a flag indicating if any exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup and theme variables for light, dark, and root styles, including color tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, applying global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with branding, story sections, and principle cards using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays analytics, KPIs, charts, and chat based on trade data, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Implements the trading journal with search, CSV export, trade table, and trade creation/editing dialog.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings management for trading defaults, strategy presets, and saving via actor-backed API.
frontend/src/pages/ToolsPage.tsx: Renders a tools page with tabs and a mobile dropdown to switch between six calculator components. Manages synchronized tool selection state across UI layouts.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Computes detailed trading performance metrics and equity curves from trade data, including drawdown, expectancy, profit factor, and streaks. Also provides helpers for equity curve and max drawdown calculations.
frontend/src/utils/breakdowns.ts: Generates monthly performance, pair distribution, and session-based statistics from trade data. Groups and aggregates trades by date, pair, and trading session.
frontend/src/utils/chatbotRules.ts: Maps user queries to responses based on performance metrics, answering common stat-related questions. Supports win rate, profit, streaks, drawdown, and general help prompts.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Creates a CSV export of trades with formatted fields and provides a browser download helper. Handles escaping CSV fields and producing rows from trade objects.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Offers safe formatters for currency, percentages, numbers, ratios, and dates. Handles NaN, Infinity, and bigint timestamps gracefully.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts readable error messages from unknown error shapes, including nested causes and backend trap formats. Falls back to JSON or generic messages when needed.
frontend/src/utils/startupErrorClassific: Classifies startup errors into standardized categories like connection, authorization, timeout, or profile issues. Returns metadata for UI display including titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/strategyPresets.ts: Parses newline-delimited strategy presets into a trimmed, deduplicated list. Removes empty lines and preserves case-sensitive uniqueness.
frontend/src/utils/toolsMath.ts: Implements math utilities for risk percent, compounding growth, drawdown recovery, and risk of ruin calculations. Provides simple financial formulas used by the tools page.
frontend/src/utils/tradingCalculations.t: Provides helper functions for risk, lot size, reward‑risk, profit/loss, percent gain/loss, and pip value calculations for trading operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including rebuild goals, known issues, and feature requests centered on fixing initialization hangs and improving startup behavior.
